content: 4 corners dishcloth r1 k19 t r29 k6 t based on elizabeth * r2 s1 k18 t r30 s1 k5 t zimmerman s r3 k18 t r31 k7 t square baby blanket r4 s1 k17 t r32 s1 k6 t r5 k17 t r33 k8 t materials r6 s1 k16 t r34 s1 k7 t 1 ball dishcloth cotton r7 k16 t r35 k9 t size us 8 straights r8 s1 k15 t r36 s1 k8 t r9 k15 t r37 k10 t abbreviations r10 s1 k14 t r38 s1 k9 t s1 slip 1 stitch purl wise r11 k14 t r39 k11 t k knit r12 s1 k13 t r40 si k10 t t turn r13 k13 t r41 k12 t to start using invisible cast r14 s1 k12 t r42 s1 k11 t on - cast on 19 stitches start at r15 k12 t r43 k13 t r1 ending at r55 start the r16 s1 k11 t r44 s1 k12 t next corner at *r2 knit 3 r17 k11 t r45 k14 t more corners break yarn r18 s1 k10 t r46 s1 k13 t r19 k10 t r47 k15 t to finish remove the waste r20 s1 k9 t r48 s1 k14 t yarn from the first corner and r21 k9 t r49 k16 t graft together the last corner to r22 s1 k8 t r50 s1 k15 t the first corner using the r23 k8 t r51 k17 t garter stitch graft method r24 s1 k7 t r52 s1 k16 t weave in all tails r25 k7 t r53 k18 t r26 s1 k6 t r54 s1 k17 t please note r27 k6 t r55 k19 t this is a free pattern make as many r28 s1 k5 t copies as you like however you may not reproduce this pattern in any publication nor can you sell it for the first half of the the second half of the profit without prior permission from corner is done now corner is done knit 3 the author you will knit back to the more beginning at r2 copyright@abigail 1870pearl middle to finish the and ending at r55 http //1870pearl typepad com/ a1870pearl@yahoo com corner
